dct_title_s: 1930 Real Estate Plat-Book of the City of Trenton and Borough of Princeton, Mercer County, New Jersey (Index Map of Trenton)
dct_description_sm: Color Index map delineating 48 sections of the city of Trenton referenced by number to the corresponding plate within the Plat-Book.
There is also a map key that includes building construction materials, building types, transportation systems, ward and city lines.
